Uses of Package
tech.barbero.http.message.signing

  • Packages that use tech.barbero.http.message.signing 
    Package Description
    tech.barbero.http.message.signing
    Single package for HTTP message signing.
    tech.barbero.http.message.signing.ahc4
    Apache HttpCore 4.x bridge.
    tech.barbero.http.message.signing.okhttp3
    OkHttp 3.x bridge.
    tech.barbero.http.message.signing.servlet
    Java Servlet API 3.x and 4.x bridge.
  • Classes in tech.barbero.http.message.signing used by tech.barbero.http.message.signing 
    Class and Description
    HttpMessage
    HTTP messages consist of requests from client to server and responses from server to client.
    HttpMessageSigner
    A utility class to add a Signature header to an HttpMessage.
    HttpMessageSigner.Algorithm
    Cryptographic algorithms which can be used for signing an HTTP message.
    HttpMessageSigner.Builder
    A builder of HttpMeesageSigner.
    KeyMap
    A KeyStore like interface.
    SignatureHeaderVerifier
    An utility class to verify the Signature header of HTTP messages.
    SignatureHeaderVerifier.Builder
    A SignatureHeaderVerifier builder.
  • Classes in tech.barbero.http.message.signing used by tech.barbero.http.message.signing.ahc4 
    Class and Description
    HttpMessageSigner
    A utility class to add a Signature header to an HttpMessage.
  • Classes in tech.barbero.http.message.signing used by tech.barbero.http.message.signing.okhttp3 
    Class and Description

    A utility class to add a Signature header to an HttpMessage.
  • Classes in tech.barbero.http.message.signing used by tech.barbero.http.message.signing.servlet

    An utility class to verify the Signature header of HTTP messages.
